languages.text: {n}Мехадендриты распластываются, словно крылья, за плечами техножреца.{/n} "Запрос одобрен, я не имею категорических запретов на разглашение данной информации".

traits.locale_text: {n}Механодендриты распластываются, словно крылья, за плечами техножреца, придавая его позе открытость. Бросив на них внимательный взгляд, Паскаль осторожно произносит:{/n} "Запрос одобрен, я не имею категорических запретов на разглашение данной информации".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Behind the Tech-Priest's shoulders, the mechadendrites spread out like wings.{/n} "The request is approved. I have no outright restrictions on disclosing this information."
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендриты распластываются, словно крылья, за плечами техножреца.{/n} "Запрос одобрен, я не имею категорических запретов на разглашение данной информации".

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechanodendrites spread behind the tech-priest's shoulders like wings, giving an openness to his posture. Pascal gives them an attentive look and says carefully:{/n} "The request is approved. I have no strict restrictions on disclosing this information."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechanodendrites spread behind the tech-priest's shoulders like wings, giving an openness to his posture. Pascal gives them an attentive look and says carefully:{/n} "The request is approved. I have no strict restrictions on disclosing this information."

traits.locale_text: {n}Behind the Tech-Priest's shoulders, the mechadendrites spread out like wings, giving an openness to his posture. Pascal scrutinizes them for a moment, then says carefully,{/n} "The request is approved. I have no outright restrictions on disclosing this information."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Behind the Tech-Priest's shoulders, the mechadendrites spread out like wings, giving an openness to his posture. Pascal scrutinizes them for a moment, then says carefully,{/n} "The request is approved. I have no outright restrictions on disclosing this information."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las mecadendritas del tecnosacerdote se extienden a su espalda como si fuesen alas.{/n} «Su solicitud ha sido aprobada. No poseo ninguna restricción vigente para divulgar esta información».
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the Tech-Priest's shoulders, the mechadendrites spread out like wings.{/n} "The request is approved. I have no outright restrictions on disclosing this information."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mecadendritas del tecnosacerdote se extienden a su espalda como si fuesen alas.{/n} «Su solicitud ha sido aprobada. No poseo ninguna restricción vigente para divulgar esta información».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技術司祭の肩の後ろから、機械触手が翼のように広げられている。{/n}「要求を承認しました。本情報の開示について、制約は設けられていません」
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the Tech-Priest's shoulders, the mechadendrites spread out like wings.{/n} "The request is approved. I have no outright restrictions on disclosing this information."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭の肩の後ろから、機械触手が翼のように広げられている。{/n}「要求を承認しました。本情報の開示について、制約は設けられていません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须像翅膀一样，在他肩膀后面展开。{/n}“请求已批准。我对于这些信息的披露没有明确的限制。”
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the Tech-Priest's shoulders, the mechadendrites spread out like wings.{/n} "The request is approved. I have no outright restrictions on disclosing this information."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须像翅膀一样，在他肩膀后面展开。{/n}“请求已批准。我对于这些信息的披露没有明确的限制。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les mécadendrites du technoprêtre se déploient comme des ailes derrière ses épaules.{/n} « Votre requête est approuvée. Je n'ai reçu aucune interdiction directe quant à la divulgation de ces informations. »
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the Tech-Priest's shoulders, the mechadendrites spread out like wings.{/n} "The request is approved. I have no outright restrictions on disclosing this information."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mécadendrites du technoprêtre se déploient comme des ailes derrière ses épaules.{/n} « Votre requête est approuvée. Je n'ai reçu aucune interdiction directe quant à la divulgation de ces informations. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Hinter den Schultern des Techpriesters breiten sich die Mechadendriten aus wie Flügel.{/n} "Genehmigung erteilt. Ich unterliege keinen direkten Einschränkungen, was die Offenlegung dieser Informationen angeht."
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the Tech-Priest's shoulders, the mechadendrites spread out like wings.{/n} "The request is approved. I have no outright restrictions on disclosing this information."
